_sText:
Made by Marnai/sk  (same person)

              -MAP INFO-
Run from the Evils zombies :/ get out to the city there you fight them.
There is 5 cool rooms :)  The last button 6 will make a trap for the zombies...
Can only open or close the door if its on the top or down and torch the ground.
There is vent you can shoot one of them and it will fall down, so you can climb over a Barricading..
After you leav the last door. will a nuke bomb explowe after 40-50 sec.

Good luck.. See if you can find all the secrets there is..5-6
________________
*PS dont steal the map, maybe a remake... :)  (if you ask me...)


There is more Screenshot in the .zip file
